title.rendered: Kerastase Fusio Dose Injectables for Personalised Hair Treatments

content.rendered:
FUSIO-DOSE REVOLUTION

Fusio-dose pushes back the limits of ultra personalisation ,a tailor-made care, an instant transformation.

Optimised formulation for higher performance, the most effective ingredients meticulously selected for their fast action on the hair finer are isolated in their purest and most concentrated state for truly unprecedented finer transformation.

THE 1ST KÉRASTASE PROFESSIONAL HAIRLAB  Concentrates and boosters come together at the core of new system, a true mixology bar dedicated to personalized. Fusio-Dose care. A hair care beauty “shot” at the heart of the salon, for busy, demanding women, that takes only 5 minutes.

THE ART OF STAGING THE BLENDING

After performing a professional hair diagnosis, your hairstylist- will offer you a Fusio-Dose ritual of super concentrated, blended active ingredients for personalized care designed to instantly and lastingly transform your hair.

With 4 instant treatments available, the revolutionary hair care range offers clients an immediate hair transformation with visible and long-lasting results.
